summary:
DMC Devil arms
Rebellion, RedQueen, Nevan, Agni&Rudra, Gloria Blade
descriptionHtml:
change RedQueen 2 handed -> 1 handed
add Nevan(battleaxe, sickle(nat, kama) form)
add Gloria\'s Blade(DMC4 white hair women\'s weapon, but I never found this blade name)
fix Agni&Rudra color
(Agni real color is Red(fire)
and Rudra is blue(frost))<- not frost wind thanks for assist:)


1.delete old file in data folder
2.over write mesh & texture file
(if you hold the weapon plaque, take that weapon and install)
changed all weapon code(all weapon crafting/Upgrade/Enchant able)

use this:
help DMC 0
and 
player.additem itemcode 1


I never had plan this mod update
someone want  use this mod mesh or textures
just give me the message and use that!!!
(add .obj file to optional
do not wait my answer! :D)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

just extract to data folder


RedQueen default setting is twohand sowrd
but overwrite mesh folder and .esp file, able to change one hand sowrd
(RedQueen OneHand folder inside file is option
you must choose RedQueen weapon type one or two hand weapon)

**invisible error is change \'mesh\' and \'meshs\' folder name to \'meshes\'
sorry

need steel smithing perk
*Upgrade and enchant able
author: RadiationTuna
